    Method

    addResource(ResourceType resource)
    addResource() is used to add a new resource to the component, only if the current number of resources is below the maximum, otherwise an exception is thrown

    getMaxCapacity() returns an int representing how many batteries this component can hold

    getTotalResource() simply returns the total number of batteries

      public int getMaxCapacity()
      getMaxCapacity() returns an int representing how many batteries this component can hold
      Specified by:

    • addResource

      public void addResource(ResourceType resource)
      addResource() is used to add a new resource to the component, only if the current number of resources is below the maximum, otherwise an exception is thrown
      Specified by:
      addResource in class StorageComponent
      Parameters:
      resource - is the resource wa want to add in the stock component
      Throws:
      Exception - if the stock component is already full

    • removeResource

      public void removeResource() throws Exception
      removeResource() simply removes a resource when called. If the component is empty throws an exception.
      Throws:
      Exception

      getTotalResource() simply returns the total number of batteries
